name: Celtic Roots
description:
Take your seat, call to the ancient spirit, talk to them through the runes and listen carefully. 

A little rune puzzle game, put the rune on the board until you can. When you complete a row or a column the magic will happen.

Features

  • 6 runes
  • 1 gameplay mode
  • relaxing gameplay

Feel free to leave suggestions, bugs to fix. Enjoy.
